templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: Standard shipping is free on all U.S. orders over $50 shipping to the lower 48 states. Maybe you can add something else to reach the minimum?

templates.name: Sales Collection
templates.content: You can take a look at our sale collection here: https://www.popmarket.com/deals

templates.name: Post Purchase Inquiries
templates.content: We don't handle post-purchase requests via text. Please email your request to customerservice@popmarket.com or feel free to call this number 866-767-1767. Please let me know if you have any questions about our products, I'm more than happy to help you here!

templates.name: Is Popmarket.com, importcds.com and deepdiscount.com owned by the same person or company?
Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at customerservice@popmarket.com, or give us a call at 866-767-1767. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://www.popmarket.com/help-res#returns

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call at 866-767-1767 or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that, but if it helps, you can check out the items we have on sale here: https://www.popmarket.com/sale/b235025

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: We don't currently have a store but definitely keep an eye out.

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/popmarketmusic/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/popmarketMusic/

templates.name: What courier / shipping provider are you using?
templates.content: It depends on the shipping address and the price of the order.

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss this is to email us directly at customerservice@popmarket.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss wholesale is to email us directly at customerservice@popmarket.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: We don't handle post-purchase requests via text. Please email your request to customerservice@popmarket.com or feel free to call this number 866-767-1767. Please let me know if you have any questions about our products, I'm more than happy to help you here!

templates.name: My discount code won't work.
templates.content: Sorry to hear that! Please know that discounts don't apply to games, video games, toys, or consoles. May I know what items you have in your cart?

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: Our sophisticated warehouse utilizes the latest technological innovations to help ensure fast order processing. We usually ship via USPS or UPS and once your order is shipped it will take 3-8 business days for domestic orders.
